name: SID 0x36 Transfer Data Test Suite
description: Comprehensive test suite for UDS Service ID 0x36 (TransferData) based on ISO 14229-1:2020 Section 10.5. Covers Block Sequence Counter (BSC) validation with wrap-around (0xFF→0x01), session validation (PROGRAMMING/EXTENDED required), security validation (unlock required), transfer state validation, message length validation, voltage monitoring, and all 7 NRCs (0x13, 0x24, 0x33, 0x73, 0x7F, 0x92, 0x93).

requests.description: TC-01: Transfer Data in DEFAULT session (no prior download) - Expect NRC 0x7F (Service Not Supported In Active Session)
TC-02.2: Transfer Data without security unlock - Expect NRC 0x33 (Security Access Denied)
TC-03.3: Send key to unlock security
TC-03.4: Transfer Data without Request Download - Expect NRC 0x24 (Request Sequence Error)
TC-05.7: Transfer Block 3 (BSC=0x03) - Success (Multiple Block Transfer)
TC-06.6: Skip BSC 2, send BSC 3 - Expect NRC 0x73 (Wrong Block Sequence Counter)
TC-07.7: Repeat BSC 2 - Expect NRC 0x73 (Wrong Block Sequence Counter)
TC-08.5: Transfer Data without BSC (empty data) - Expect NRC 0x13 (Incorrect Message Length)
TC-09.5: Transfer Data with BSC only (no data bytes) - Expect NRC 0x13 (Incorrect Message Length)
TC-10.1: Enter PROGRAMMING session (Upload requires PROGRAMMING)
TC-10.5: Transfer Data in EXTENDED session (after Request Upload) - Expect Success (0x76 0x01)
TC-11: Transfer Data in DEFAULT session - Expect NRC 0x7F (Service Not Supported In Active Session)
TC-12.7: Transfer Data after Transfer Exit - Expect NRC 0x24 (Request Sequence Error)
TC-13.5: Transfer Block 1 with large payload (14 data bytes) - Success (tests block length validation)
TC-14.8: Transfer Block 4 - Complete Download Workflow Test
TC-14.9: Request Transfer Exit - Successful download complete
TC-15.3: Send key to unlock security
TC-15.5: Transfer Data with LOW VOLTAGE (10.5V < 11.0V) - Expect NRC 0x93 (Voltage Too Low)
TC-16.3: Send key to unlock security
TC-16.5: Transfer Data with HIGH VOLTAGE (16.5V > 15.5V) - Expect NRC 0x92 (Voltage Too High)
TC-17.5: Transfer Block 1 at NORMAL VOLTAGE (12.5V) - Success
TC-17.6: Transfer Block 2 at LOW VOLTAGE (10.2V) - NOTE: Voltage check depends on test runner passing voltage parameter
TC-17.7: Transfer Block 3 at NORMAL VOLTAGE (12.5V) - Success (continues after TC-17.6)
TC-18.4: Request Download for LARGE transfer (0x10000 bytes = 256+ blocks for wrap test)
TC-18.8: INVALID BSC=0x00 (should NEVER be used) - Expect NRC 0x73 (Wrong BSC)
TC-19.4: Request Download for SMALL area (16 bytes only)
TC-19.5: Transfer exactly 16 bytes in Block 1 - Success
TC-19.6: Transfer Block 2 EXCEEDS requested memory size - Expect NRC 0x31 (Request Out Of Range)
TC-20.1: Enter PROGRAMMING session (Upload requires PROGRAMMING)
TC-20.4: REQUEST UPLOAD (SID 0x35): Read 0x1000 bytes from Addr=0x00100000
TC-20.5: Transfer Data UPLOAD Block 1 (BSC only, ECU returns data) - Expect Success 0x76 01 + data
TC-20.6: Transfer Data UPLOAD Block 2 - Expect Success 0x76 02 + data
TC-20.7: Transfer Data UPLOAD Block 3 - Expect Success 0x76 03 + data
TC-20.8: Request Transfer Exit - Upload Complete
TC-21.4: Request Download REGION 1 (Application): Addr=0x00100000, Size=0x0800
TC-21.7: Request Transfer Exit - REGION 1 Complete
TC-21.8: Request Download REGION 2 (Calibration): Addr=0x00200000, Size=0x0800
TC-21.9: REGION 2 Block 1 (BSC RESETS to 0x01) - Success (BSC restarts per region)
TC-21.11: Request Transfer Exit - REGION 2 Complete (Multi-Region Flash Success)
TC-22.6: TESTER PRESENT (SID 0x3E) during long transfer - Keep session alive
TC-22.7: Transfer Block 2 AFTER Tester Present - Success (Session maintained)
TC-22.8: TESTER PRESENT again - Keep session alive
TC-22.10: Request Transfer Exit - Long Transfer with Keep-Alive Complete
TC-23.4: Request Download for NON-ALIGNED size (12 bytes - not multiple of block)
TC-23.5: Transfer PARTIAL LAST BLOCK (12 bytes < max block size) - Expect Success
TC-23.6: Request Transfer Exit - Partial Block Transfer Complete
[SETUP] Reset for TC-24 (Transfer After Exit Without New Request)
TC-24.7: Transfer Data WITHOUT new Request Download - Expect NRC 0x24 (Request Sequence Error)
[SETUP] Reset for TC-25 (Security Re-lock Edge Case)
TC-25.5: Transfer Block 1 while security unlocked - Success
TC-25.6: SESSION RESET (causes security to RE-LOCK)
TC-25.7: Re-enter PROGRAMMING session (security now LOCKED)
TC-25.8: Transfer Data with SECURITY RE-LOCKED - Expect NRC 0x33 (Security Access Denied)

metadata.author: UDS Simulator - Automotive ECU Testing
metadata.description: Production-grade ISO 14229-1:2020 Section 10.5 compliant test suite for SID 0x36 (TransferData). Comprehensive coverage: voltage monitoring (NRC 0x92/0x93), BSC wrap-around (0xFF→0x01), multi-region flash programming, upload workflow (SID 0x35), tester present keep-alive, partial block handling, error recovery patterns, and all 10 NRCs.

notes: Test Suite v2.0.0 (Production-Grade): 25 test categories with 172 requests. ISO 14229-1:2020 compliant. Tests: TC-01 to TC-14 (original), TC-15 (Voltage Too Low 0x93), TC-16 (Voltage Too High 0x92), TC-17 (Voltage Recovery - Recoverable Error), TC-18 (BSC Wrap-Around 0xFF→0x01), TC-19 (Request Out Of Range 0x31), TC-20 (Upload Workflow SID 0x35), TC-21 (Multi-Region Flash Programming), TC-22 (Tester Present 0x3E Keep-Alive), TC-23 (Partial Last Block), TC-24 (Transfer After Exit - Edge Case), TC-25 (Security Re-Lock - Edge Case). Validates ALL 10 NRCs: 0x13 (IncorrectMessageLength), 0x24 (RequestSequenceError), 0x31 (RequestOutOfRange), 0x33 (SecurityAccessDenied), 0x73 (WrongBlockSequenceCounter), 0x7F (ServiceNotSupportedInActiveSession), 0x92 (VoltageTooHigh), 0x93 (VoltageTooLow). Covers: service interactions (0x10→0x27→0x34/0x35→0x36→0x37→0x3E), error recovery patterns, edge cases, and production automotive ECU testing scenarios.
